name: Tethered (itch) (admanic)
description:
Part of the GMTK2021 Game Jam with the theme of Joined Together.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Click/Left Trigger: Fire Tether Point 1
  • Right Mouse Click/Right Trigger: Fire Tether Point 2
  • WASD/Left Stick: Movement
  • Mouse/Right Stick: Aim
  • Q/A Button: Tether/Untether
  • Space/RB: Jump

Try to navigate the world as fast as you can by tethering your self, objects and keys around. If you only shoot one tether point, you can tether yourself to things!

Coloured Keys need to be attached to one another to open the door. 

Created by:

Adam "admanic" Pearce

Harry Nixon

Xalamon

Dan Pho

Known Bugs:

Sometimes tethers will stop tethering two keys.
